Roadmap.Name: Add CSV Upload
Roadmap.Description: Add the ability upload CSV files.

Roadmap.Name: Add XLS Upload
Roadmap.Description: Add the ability upload older spreadsheets in an XLS format.

Roadmap.Name: Save As XML, CSV, HTML
Roadmap.Description: Save As XML, CSV, HTML formats at same time as JSON save. Maybe as setting?

Roadmap.Name: Add Settings Page
Roadmap.Description: Create a settings page for common settings of the application.

Roadmap.Name: Edit in Table View
Roadmap.Description: Allow the editing of JSON files in a table view.

Roadmap.Name: Edit with Google Spreadsheet
Roadmap.Description: Allow the creation and editing of JSON files with a Google Spreadsheet, with two way sync.

Roadmap.Name: Generate API with api.ongithub.com
Roadmap.Description: Allow the generation of a Swagger definition from data file that creates repo in the api.github.com domain.

Roadmap.Name: Create version of data.ongithub that runs on Amazon S3
Roadmap.Description: Recreate all the functionality that we have here, but run on AWS S3. This increases the scalability of the platform.
